problem_section.title: The Problem Every AI Landing Page User Faces

problems.title: Forms Don't Work
problems.description: ChatGPT and v0 generate beautiful HTML forms, but they're just frontend code. No backend = no submissions captured.

problems.title: Leads Are Lost Forever
problems.description: Without a working backend, every form submission disappears into the void. You're losing money with every visitor.

problems.title: Technical Setup Is Confusing
problems.description: Building your own form backend requires coding skills, server setup, database management, and hours of work.

problems.title: No Way To Track Leads
problems.description: Even if you get forms working, you still need a system to organize, follow up, and convert leads into customers.

solution_section.title: Introducing LeadInbox.io
solution_section.subtitle: The Complete Solution: Form Backend + CRM in One
solution_section.description: We built LeadInbox specifically for marketers using AI-generated landing pages. Get your forms working in 60 seconds, then manage every lead in your built-in CRM.
solution_section.main_visual_alt: Simple 3-step process showing form creation to lead management

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: From broken form to closed deal in 3 simple steps

steps.title: Create Your Form Endpoint
steps.description: Sign up and click 'New Form'. We instantly generate a unique endpoint URL for you. No coding required.

steps.title: Paste Into Your AI-Generated Form
steps.description: Copy our one-line code snippet and paste it into your ChatGPT or v0 landing page. Your form now works!

steps.title: Manage Leads In Your CRM
steps.description: Every submission flows into your dashboard. Tag leads, add notes, track status, and never lose a potential customer.

bonus_feature.title: Already Have Forms?
bonus_feature.description: Connect your existing forms from any platform using webhooks. Centralize all your leads in one place.

questions.question: What is the Lifetime Deal exactly?
questions.answer: Pay ‚Çπ999 once and get lifetime access to the Starter Plan (500 submissions/month, unlimited forms, full CRM features). You'll automatically get all new features we add to the Starter Plan in the future. No recurring fees, ever.

questions.question: How is this different from Basin or Typeform?
questions.answer: Basin and Typeform are just form backends. LeadInbox is form backend + CRM in one. We're also the only tool built specifically for AI-generated landing pages. Plus, our lifetime deal costs less than 1 month of their subscriptions.

questions.question: Do I need coding skills?
questions.answer: Absolutely not! If you can copy-paste, you can use LeadInbox. Just paste our endpoint into your AI-generated form and you're done. The CRM is 100% no-code too.

questions.question: Can I connect my existing forms?
questions.answer: Yes! Use our webhook feature to connect forms from Typeform, Google Forms, Webflow, or any platform that supports webhooks. Centralize all your leads in one place.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed 500 submissions/month?
questions.answer: Your forms will keep working! We'll never block submissions. You can upgrade to a higher plan or purchase additional submissions as needed. We'll notify you before you hit the limit.

questions.question: When will the CRM features be ready?
questions.answer: Basic CRM features (tagging, notes, status tracking) will launch in Phase 2 (estimated 8-10 weeks). Advanced features (pipeline view, email sequences) in Phase 3 (12-16 weeks). As a lifetime member, you get everything automatically.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All data is encrypted in transit (SSL) and at rest. We're hosted on secure servers and follow industry best practices. Your data is YOUR data - we'll never sell it or use it for anything except providing you the service.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If LeadInbox doesn't work for you, just email us and we'll refund you immediately. No questions asked.

questions.question: Can I upgrade later?
questions.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to Pro or Business plans anytime. Your lifetime Starter Plan benefits will carry over, and you'll just pay the difference.

questions.question: How many forms can I create?
questions.answer: Unlimited! Create as many forms as you need. The only limit is 500 total submissions per month across all forms.

questions.question: Do you offer support?
questions.answer: Yes! All lifetime members get priority email support. We typically respond within 24 hours (often much faster). We also have detailed documentation and video tutorials.

questions.question: Why are you offering this lifetime deal?
questions.answer: We're pre-launching and want to build a community of early adopters who can give us feedback. Your insights will help shape the product. Plus, early supporters deserve the best deal!
